0011100100001110 1011011111010001 1 -> sum: 1111000011100000, cout: 0
1111010001111010 0011001000110100 0 -> sum: 0010011010101110, cout: 1
0011001010010101 1110001101101001 0 -> sum: 0001010111111110, cout: 1
0101011011111011 1100110010101100 0 -> sum: 0010001110100111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
